title: Reorder Audio section to appear between Mantra Text and Meaning

requirements.summary: Move the conditional Audio section so it renders directly below the Mantra Text card and above the Meaning card, without changing when it appears or any audio behavior/text.
acceptanceCriteria: When selecting Veda = Samaveda and Mantra Number = 47, the Audio card appears visually below the Mantra Text card and above the Meaning card.
When selecting any other (Veda, Mantra Number) combination, the Audio section is not rendered (same behavior as today).
No existing audio functionality regresses: audio fetch/playback still works when audio exists; upload/replace still works; loading/error/empty states render as before.

file_operations.description: Reorder the JSX in the single-page layout to render <MantraAudioSection> (still gated by the existing shouldShowAudio condition: Samaveda + mantra 47) immediately after the Mantra Text card and before the Meaning card; keep all user-facing text unchanged (English). Ensure the moved section still uses the existing blob-storage ExternalBlob-based behavior via MantraAudioSection (direct URL playback + upload progress), and that no loading/error/empty states change. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
